emptyState.title: No agents yet
emptyState.description: Get started by creating your first AI agent. Agents help you set up specialized AI assistants for specific tasks and workflows.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Agent
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

createDialog.title: Add New Agent
createDialog.description: Create a new AI agent with specific capabilities. Fill in the details below.

form.instructionsPlaceholder: Enter the agent's instructions and behavior...

capabilities.generateChartsDescription: Create visual charts and graphs from data
capabilities.statisticalCalculationsDescription: Perform complex statistical analysis and computations
capabilities.createDocumentsDescription: Create and format various types of documents

editDialog.title: Edit Agent
editDialog.description: Make changes to your agent here. Click save when you're done.

form.instructionsPlaceholder: Enter the agent's instructions and behavior...

capabilities.generateChartsDescription: Create visual charts and graphs from data
capabilities.statisticalCalculationsDescription: Perform complex statistical analysis and computations
capabilities.createDocumentsDescription: Generate and format various types of documents

create.error: Failed to create agent. Please try again.

update.error: Failed to update agent. Please try again.

delete.error: Failed to delete agent. Please try again.

sources.title: Knowledge Sources
sources.empty: No sources added yet. Upload files to give your agent access to specific knowledge.
sources.loadError: Failed to load sources. Please try again.
sources.addError: Failed to add source. Please try again.
sources.removeError: Failed to remove source. Please try again.

confirmRemove.title: Remove Source
confirmRemove.description: Are you sure you want to remove "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

addDialog.title: Add Knowledge Source
addDialog.description: Upload a file to give your agent access to specific knowledge and information.

dropzone.title: Drop your file here, or click to select
dropzone.subtitle: Supports PDF, DOC, TXT, MD, CSV, JSON, XML files
